intro: Lastrea christensenii, commonly known as the Christensen's lastrea, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant features fleshy, blue-green leaves that are arranged in a rosette pattern. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange during the warmer months. Due to its unique appearance and adaptability to arid conditions, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant.
